name: The worst game of all time. [VIH 2021]
name_original: The worst game of all time. [VIH 2021]
description:
You asked for it. the shitpost you had seen on the vinesause is hope is now here.

Behold. the power of a "game" that was created in a few days simply because joel said "hey make game for charity pls"

So it was all his fault.

Anyways.

You can't exit the game so just ALT+F4.

Like i said, this shitpost was QUICKLY thrown together due to time constraints and me working on an actual game during that time.

Speaking of which. Check back soon.

As I will upload something I am actually putting a ton of effort and care into. *wink wink* ( AN ACTUAL GAME! Whoah... Surprising.)
